title: Washita Battlefield National Historic Site: Restaurants
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Restaurants              Restaurants       Las Casuelas (Mexican) 217 S. Ll Males Ave. Cheyenne, OK 73628 Phone: (580) 497-3433 Hours: Mon-Fri 11am-8pm, Sat 11am-9pm, Sun 11am-2pm   Las Casuelas serves Mexican and American food including everything from enchiladas to hamburgers. Ode's Cafe (American) 103 S. First Street Cheyenne, OK 73682 Phone: (580) 497-2393 Hours: Monday-Friday 10:00 am-8:00 pm Ode's Cafe serves hamburgers, hot dogs, club sandwiches, barbecue, chicken strips, and more. Zoe's Restaurant (American) 102 1/2 N. Cearlock Cheyenne, OK 73628 Phone: (580) 497-2339 Hours: Monday-Friday 6:00 am-9:00 pm  Zoe's Restaurant in Cheyenne is open weekdays for lunch and dinner. Famous for their down home cooking, Zoe's Restaurant features a wide variety of American items.
